name: Bad Ducks 2
description:
The ducks are back in town!

Aliens have crashed the ducks' Summer Solstice Celebration and it's up to Duck to stop them.

Will you fight your way through waves of enemies or negotiate your way to victory?

Enjoy this sequel to the summer classic Bad Ducks!

This game was made for the HoneyNutFemios Birthday Jam.

The soundtrack was produced by Blue Wave Theory. Download the full versions of the songs (and their other albums) on Free Music Archive.
